    public class Point
extends com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2
implements Positionable

      • rotateAround

        public void rotateAround(Point center,
                float degrees)
        Rotates this Point around another Point
        Parameters:
        center - The Point to rotate around
        degrees - The angle to rotate by in degrees

      • isOnLineBetween

        public boolean isOnLineBetween(Point a,
                      Point b)
        Returns if this Point is between a and b on a line
        Parameters:
        a - Point a on a line
        b - Point b on a line
        Returns:
        False if this Point is not on the same line as a and b OR is not between a and b on the same line
